title: Luna Touched
description:
My name is Luna. I applied to a job ad that sounded too good to be true. 
It was!
 I'm being sent to an Alien Planet to marry an Alien guy with four-arms. But now I'm here, I just found out I'm getting FIVE Alien husbands not one. This was not what I applied for. But one of the Alien guys broke my Translator and things are about to get messy.  Luna Touched is the first in a series of standalone books. This book is Reverse Harem. Sexy Aliens with four-arms and tails... what more could you want?
author: Belle Harper
